Params[3]: The morning breeze has swayed the flowers and scattered their petals.
In contrast to the tranquility surrounding them, those standing in the center of the flower field are in a tense confrontation.
Critical success! The gravity suction spell worked. Let me see who's the unlucky one.
Gray Raven's Lucia, Liv, Lee, and 【kuroname】in ghost form. Rolling the results for you now.
3 escaped, 1 affected by the spell. Demon Ayla's gravity suction spell worked on... Liv.
Hehe, Liv's mine.
Ayla hugs Liv and pulls her close.
Don't forget your lines, Liv.
Am I really going to say that...? "Help, help."
Wait, we have our gravity suction spell too. Commandant!
Due to your ghost form, the spell's success chance is extremely low. The result of the throw is... Critical failure.
What?
On the screen, the transparent, irregular object that represents your soul is pulled toward Ayla like a stretched dough.
Hooray! Commandant's mine too!
Commandant, Liv, just hold on a little longer. I'm coming.
Lucia swings her blade. Unfortunately, she fails to break free from the vines.
Why?
Under the effect of poison, Lucia of Gray Raven has insufficient strength. The action to swing a blade has failed.
Shouldn't have spent so many points on intelligence...
Haha. Has everyone finished their turn?
Good. Time for Demon Ayla to move!
Ayla takes her hand off Liv and wields her giant scythe.
The swish of the scythe can be heard clearly. You can almost see yourself cut into pieces by the dancing blade.
Tonight, Demon Ayla joins the hunt.
Now.
BANG!
The next instant, a bullet hits the demon's face.
It leaves a big hole in her head. She collapses with a smile frozen on her face.
Wait, wait! That was so mean!
Inside the lounge, Ayla closes her script, then tries really hard to find a rule that can stop Lee from "shooting the demon" in the handbook.
Omega weapon allows me to use any weapon in my knowledge as long as it's operated with my hands.
Besides, the "ensnaring vines" only worked on my lower body. With my upper body free, I can fire with no problem.
I know, I know... Um... It all seems to make sense.
Admitting her defeat, Ayla opens the script again to conclude the story.
Well, our team of heroes finally came to confront the demon. After a short engagement, Demon Ayla used her spell to capture Liv.
Soon, 【kuroname】 was also impacted by their own spell. Things seemed to have gone bad really quickly. Lucia dragged her weak body to move forward...
Just then, Lee took out a steel tube that utilized the propulsion of gunpowder, killing the demon on the spot with a 140 gr metal piece...
I can already think of what the audience would say.
Ayla claps her hands to her head. Everyone seems to have seen the disaster this screenplay would bring...
You asked us to be as imaginative as we could...
4 hours ago, when Gray Raven was preparing for the Dragon Boat Festival...
Liv, I've got the ingredients for rice dumplings.
Thanks, Lucia. Leave it to me. Lee, can you take over here?
No problem. I have set the timer. 2 min 37 sec.
Everybody is busy preparing for the upcoming Dragon Boat Festival in the kitchen.
Guess we have to stop here...
Someone has pushed the door open—the kitchen used old-school doors for a more festive feel.
Would you like to make a movie together, dear Gray Raven?
We'll create a script via a role-playing game, then make it into a movie and show it on the Dragon Boat Festival. That's what you said.
Indeed. But a story needs to be dramatic.
I did some searching in the game forum. It seems that as long as we follow our heart to play this game, it can be sufficiently... dramatic.
Anyway, I have a good understanding of your play style now. Here's a new script.
That was fast.
Bring it on. Reset the adventure world!
Lee follows Ayla's instructions to enter the commands. The scrolling ending screen quickly disappears.
A new world based on AI-generated images is unveiled.
